name: AWS Thinkbox XMesh
short: A service for saving, loading, and rendering 3D mesh data on AWS.
description: AWS Thinkbox XMesh is a geometry caching system that enables high-speed reading and writing of 3D datasets, often used in CGI rendering. It's designed for performance, versatility, and efficient memory usage, making it ideal for handling complex, high-resolution assets. XMesh supports multiple 3D platforms and provides a range of compression and saving options. It helps artists and studios streamline workflows, reduce disk space usage, and manage render time, ensuring efficient and high-quality results.
